messages.subject: Geneaology
messages.msgSnippet: Any of you geneaology buffs out there feel like sharing your favourite sites?  I m getting fired up to really start working on mine, and I m also thinking of
messages.messageBody:
Any of you geneaology buffs out there feel like sharing your favourite
sites? I'm getting fired up to really start working on mine, and I'm also
thinking of doing a column on internet geneaology. Along with the basics,
if you've had to deal with German, Swedish, Ukrainian, or Polish ancestors,
I'd love to hear about your faves.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
